channel.title: PI get no error but need help

item.title: PI get no error but need help
item.dc:creator: @omgomgomgl omgomgomgl
item.description:
@omgomgomgl wrote:

So i add this is my actionhandler.java

case 8540:
c.getDH().sendDialogues(809, npcType);
break;

I added this is my dialoguehandler.java

case 809:
sendNpcChat2(“Oh my! Please “+c.playerName+”!”, " I lost my hat! Will you find it for me!", c.talkingNpc, “Boy”);
c.nextChat = 810;
break;
case 810:
sendOption2(“Yes I guess”, “Not right now”);
c.dialogueAction = 810;
c.dialogueId = 810;
c.teleAction = -1;
break;
case 811:
sendNpcChat3(“Oh gosh thanks “+c.playerName+”!”," All you need to do is talk to rob!"," You can find him in varrock bank!", c.talkingNpc, “Boy”);
c.nextChat = -1;

and I add this in my clickingbuttons.java

} else if(c.dialogueAction == 811) {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(811, 8540);
c.dialogueAction = -1;

my problem is… I clicked on the npc it startes with the first message then go to the next chat like planned if you are looking at my code. but when I click yes it will not go to the chat I have ask it to in my clickingbuttons.java

help please thanks!

Read full topic
